title: Patriots
description: Whether they admit it or not, or even realize it, their whole lives have been altered by the events of September 11th, 2001, when they were just kids.They came to this paradise of a college campus to find freedom, themselves, their future, sex, love, fun, God, intellectual discovery, their creative core â€¦ but instead find their world being torn apart again by political divisiveness, extremism, rage.And now one of them will turn back to the terror of their youth in the hope of finding answers.The rest will be victims.Please also check out www.patriotsthenovel.com and @patriotsthenovel on Instagram. [Meta: Patriots the novel patriots novel ]
author: Will Kane Thompson
